title: Menu Items Schema
description: Schema for Smash Burgers menu items. Use this as a reference when adding or editing menu items.

id.description: Unique identifier for the menu item. Use lowercase with hyphens (e.g., 'classic-smash'). This should never change once created.

name.description: Display name of the menu item as it appears to customers.

description.description: Brief description of the menu item. Should be concise and appetizing.
examples: A juicy smashed patty, American cheese, pickles, signature sauce.

price.description: Price in dollars and cents (e.g., '10.99'). Do NOT include the dollar sign.

category.description: Category this item belongs to. Must match one of the main category keys.

imagePath.description: Path to the item's image. Should start with '/images/' and reference a file in the public/images or images directory.

featured.description: Whether this item should be featured/highlighted on the menu. Only set a few items to true.

HOW_TO_ADD_NEW_ITEM: 1. Choose the correct category (burgers, chicken, reubens, or sides)
2. Create a unique 'id' using lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only
3. Write a clear, appetizing 'name' for the item
4. Write a concise 'description' (keep it under 200 characters)
5. Set the 'price' as a number with exactly 2 decimal places (no $ symbol)
6. Set 'category' to match the section you're adding it to
7. Set 'imagePath' to point to an image in /images/
8. Set 'featured' to true only for your best/most popular items
HOW_TO_UPDATE_PRICE: 1. Find the item by its 'name' or 'id'
2. Update the 'price' field with the new price
3. Make sure to use exactly 2 decimal places (e.g., '12.99' not '12.9' or '13')
HOW_TO_CHANGE_IMAGE: 1. Add your new image to the /images/ directory
2. Update the 'imagePath' field to point to the new image
3. Make sure the path starts with '/images/'
COMMON_MISTAKES: DON'T include the $ symbol in price - use '10.99' not '$10.99'
DON'T forget the /images/ prefix in imagePath
DON'T use uppercase or spaces in the 'id' field
DON'T set too many items as featured - keep it to 1-2 per category
